metadata.synopsis: A group of adventurers reconvene after spreading around in Wyrm's Crossing to buy supplies. They are in a rush to leave for neverwinter before the absolute arrives. This is the Elf one liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -16; 51; -52- Talk to the elf of the adventurer group.

0.speaker: Sarafin
0.text: You look like you need to clean off the road-dirt almost as much as I do. No good inns with hot water and a tub on this side of the Crossing though.

1.speaker: Sarafin
1.text: If you've ever considered bathing in the Chionthar, don't. I tried it once, and came out dirtier than I was when I went in.
